pharmacyServices.name: Prescription Dispensing
pharmacyServices.description: Filling and dispensing medications prescribed by healthcare providers, including verifying dosages and checking for drug interactions.

pharmacyServices.name: Medication Counseling
pharmacyServices.description: Providing patients with information about their medications, including proper usage, side effects, and storage instructions.

pharmacyServices.name: Immunizations
pharmacyServices.description: Administering vaccines such as flu shots, COVID-19 vaccines, shingles, and other routine immunizations.

pharmacyServices.name: Over-the-Counter (OTC) Recommendations
pharmacyServices.description: Advising customers on appropriate non-prescription medications for minor ailments and symptoms.

pharmacyServices.name: Prescription Refills
pharmacyServices.description: Processing refills for ongoing prescriptions, often with options for auto-refill and reminder notifications.

pharmacyServices.name: Medication Therapy Management
pharmacyServices.description: Reviewing a patient's complete medication regimen to optimize therapeutic outcomes and reduce risks.

pharmacyServices.name: Health Screenings
pharmacyServices.description: Offering basic health checks such as blood pressure monitoring, cholesterol testing, and blood glucose testing.

pharmacyServices.name: Compounding Services
pharmacyServices.description: Preparing customized medications tailored to individual patient needs when commercial options are unsuitable.

pharmacyServices.name: Insurance and Billing Assistance
pharmacyServices.description: Helping patients navigate insurance coverage, process claims, and find cost-saving options for medications.

pharmacyServices.name: Home Delivery
pharmacyServices.description: Delivering prescriptions directly to patients' homes for convenience, especially for those with mobility issues.

pharmacyServices.name: Medication Synchronization
pharmacyServices.description: Aligning refill dates for multiple prescriptions so patients can pick up all medications in a single visit.

pharmacyServices.name: Drug Disposal Programs
pharmacyServices.description: Providing safe disposal options for expired or unused medications to prevent misuse and environmental harm.
